## RedemptionDetails interface

Details of a [redeemARTH()](./arth-base.transactableliquity.redeemarth.md) transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface RedemptionDetails 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [actualARTHAmount](./arth-base.redemptiondetails.actualarthamount.md) | [Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md) | Amount of ARTH that was actually redeemed by the transaction. |
|  [attemptedARTHAmount](./arth-base.redemptiondetails.attemptedarthamount.md) | [Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md) | Amount of ARTH the redeemer tried to redeem. |
|  [collateralTaken](./arth-base.redemptiondetails.collateraltaken.md) | [Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md) | Amount of collateral (e.g. Ether) taken from Troves by the transaction. |
|  [fee](./arth-base.redemptiondetails.fee.md) | [Decimal](./arth-base.decimal.md) | Amount of native currency (e.g. Ether) deducted as fee from collateral taken. |
